recipes.title: Ambur Biryani
recipes.method: 1. Prepare the base for the biryani. 2. Add the chicken and saute them till brown. 3. Cook till all the chicken and other ingredients come to a gravy consistency. 4. Add 5kg soaked basmati rice and add water till both the rice and masala are at the same level. 5. Cook till done and serve.
